scripts.dev: concurrently --raw --names babel,test,type "babel src --verbose --out-dir build --extensions ".js,.ts" --watch" "sleep 2 && nodemon --delay 1 --watch build build/test" "tsc --incremental --preserveWatchOutput --noEmit --watch"
scripts.release: yarn build && cp package.json build && cp readme.md build && cd build && rm -rf test && npm publish
